channel.title: Rest in Peace, Stefan Karl Steffanson
channel.description:
Today we lost a great man, Stefan Karl Steffanson, who played Robbie Rotten in LazyTown. A creator of the greatest meme, We Are Number One, he lost his battle with cancer today even though he seemed to have recovered earlier this year.
![49d8b250-a5d7-11e8-8ac8-1bb909c2a7d1_skynews-stefn-karl-stefnsson_4397184|666x500](upload://2Xeq4SEcXfhUFD9ePIAqayuMVhS.jpeg)
A true legend.
In memory of him, I present to you the video that started it all.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PfYnvDL0Qcw
Rest in Peace Stefan.

item.title: Rest in Peace, Stefan Karl Steffanson
item.dc:creator: Hubaris
item.description:
A true legend, who also brought us:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i8ju_10NkGY

A lot of people I know really loved this show as parents and as kids so its really sad to see it happen.
At least that whole campaign a couple of years back gave him two more years with his loved ones.

Read full topic
item.source: Rest in Peace, Stefan Karl Steffanson

Today we lost a great man, Stefan Karl Steffanson, who played Robbie Rotten in LazyTown.
A creator of the greatest meme, We Are Number One, he lost his battle with cancer today even though he seemed to have recovered earlier this year.

A true legend.

In memory of him, I present to you the video that started it all.
